name: the big bad burger
description:
FULLSCREEN NEEDET 

A Boy wants to beccome healthy. He SACRIFICES Fastfood so he dont gets fat. Then a big bad burger Comes and wants to be eaten by the Boy. The Boy doesnt want to eat the burger, so the burger chases him.
You must save the Boy frome the burger so he doesnt gets fat.
 
MOVEMENT:  

  - Space to jump
PS:
Every level is possible ( I tryed it my self)
Get to the end for a suprise.
